title: About Me
subtitle: Software Development Engineer | Flutter & Backend Developer | AI Enthusiast
description: I'm Sadique Iqbal, a passionate Software Development Engineer who loves turning complex ideas into smooth, scalable mobile experiences. I specialize in building full-stack apps using Flutter, Firebase, and FastAPI — from concept to production. I enjoy crafting AI-integrated, user-focused products that make everyday life simpler and smarter. When I’m not coding, I explore new technologies and refine ways to make apps feel more human.
highlights: Building production-grade apps with Flutter and Firebase
Integrating AI assistants using Google Agent Development Kit & FastAPI
Experienced in cross-platform architecture and API design
Open to remote and freelance opportunities
